message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $15,000. I believe it holds significant value and this price reflects its worth.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I believe that's a fair price for the product, considering its value to me.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I understand your perspective, the product's value is considerably higher.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,500?
I'm still a bit far apart on the price. I'm willing to meet you at $10,500, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
